title: CAPE-STYLE TRENCH COAT WITH FLORAL PRINT
desc: Short trench coat in double-layered cotton fabric with distinctive cape-inspired design. This model features a refined all-over floral print and is complete with a matching belt with buckle. The interior is embellished with a contrasting check motif.• Regular fit• Pointed collar• Matching belt with buckle• Side slip pockets• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
